1516700.name: Disgraced Supporter Pack DLC
1516700.description:
Disgraced

The Supporter Pack DLC is for people who'd like to show their continued support for us at Corrosive Studios and to help us continue to grow and do what we do while also giving you an edge in the game by rewarding your character with some extra tools to aid them in their travels.

Supporter Pack DLC:
  • 1x Masterwork Katana (weapon)
  • 30x Ryo (money)
  • 15x Influence (reputation)
  • 3x Mastery Journals (experience)
  • 1x Remedy (healing item)

*This DLC is intended for players who enjoy the game and want to continue to show their support for the developer and get some cool extras in the game.

PLEASE NOTE: IN ORDER TO RECEIVE THE ITEMS FROM THIS PACK, YOU MUST ACCESS THE SUPPLY CACHE IN YOUR HEAD QUARTERS IN KIBO. YOU CAN GET THE ITEMS ANYTIME YOU WISH! YOU DO NOT NEED TO START A NEW GAME!
